verses.name: Matthew 13:20
verses.text: But he that received the seed into stony places, the same is he that heareth the word, and anon with joy receiveth it;

verses.name: Matthew 13:21
verses.text: Yet hath he not root in himself, but dureth for a while: for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word, by and by he is offended.

verses.name: Matthew 13:22
verses.text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word; and the care of this world, and the deceitfulness of riches, choke the word, and he becometh unfruitful.
